data.actual_result: Some emojis/reactions with a special format get stretched.
data.expected_result: All reactions/emojis should be shown with the correct format.
data.short_description: Some reactions get stretched for the menu with all reactions
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a message with some reactions or add some - Hover over the message and click on the 3 dots - Now click on `Reactions` - Observe some emojis there
